description: Take a pasta bake and make it Greek-inspired with this easy pastitsio recipe. In just four steps, you'll have a pasta dish the family will rave on about.
name: Easy Greek Pastitsio Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.33 cup finely grated parmesan (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Brush a 20 x 26cm (6cm deep) ovenproof dish with 1 tbs oil. Add breadcrumbs to dish and shake to coat base of dish.
Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain. Return pasta to pan.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook onion, garlic and mince, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until browned. Add pasta sauce and bring to the boil. Remove pan from heat.

Meanwhile, whisk carbonara sauce and eggs in a bowl. Add half the carbonara sauce mixture to pasta and stir to coat. Spoon into dish, pressing lightly to compact. Top with mince mixture, then carbonara sauce mixture. Scatter over parmesan. Bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until golden. Top with extra parmesan and parsley, and serve with salad leaves.
